mapper.select:
SELECT SortSeq AS "SortSeq" FROM ( SELECT u.UserCode AS UserCode , ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY u.SortKey+1, u.DisplayName ) AS SortSeq FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER u JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup ub ON u.UserCode = ub.UserCode AND ub.JobType = 'Origin'
JOIN sys_object_domain d ON ub.CompanyCode = d.DomainCode AND d.DomainID = #{domainID}
LEFT JOIN sys_license_opt_user e ON u.UserCode = e.UserCode
LEFT JOIN sys_object_domain_license e ON u.LicSeq = e.LicSeq
AND d.DomainID = e.DomainID
AND e.DomainID = 0
WHERE u.IsUse = 'Y' ) A WHERE UserCode = #{userCode}

SELECT LicDomain "LicDomain" , LicUserCount "LicUserCount" , LicExpireDate "LicExpireDate" , LieExUserCount "LieExUserCount" , LicEx1Date "LicEx1Date" , ChargerEmail "ChargerEmail" FROM sys_object_domain WHERE IsUse = 'Y' AND DomainID = #{domainID}

SELECT LicDomain "LicDomain" , odl.LicUserCount "LicUserCount" , odl.LicExpireDate "LicExpireDate" , odl.LicExUserCount "LicExUserCount" , odl.LicEx1Date "LicEx1Date" , ChargerEmail "ChargerEmail" FROM sys_object_domain od JOIN sys_object_domain_license odl on od.domainid = odl.domainid WHERE IsUse = 'Y' AND od.DomainID = #{domainID} AND odl.LicSeq = #{licSeq}

/* queryID : framework.license.selectDownloadExcel2nd */ SELECT CONCAT(CONCAT(t1.DisplayName, ' / '), t1.DomainCode) AS "DisplayName" , '-' AS "IsOpt" , '-' AS "LicName" , t2.ServiceEnd AS "ServiceEnd" , NVL(t2.ServiceUser, 0) AS "ServiceUser" , t2.ExtraExpiredate AS "ExtraExpiredate" , NVL(t2.ExtraServiceUser, 0) AS "ExtraServiceUser" , '0' AS "LicUsingCnt" , '0' AS "RemainCnt" , '' AS "OverYN" FROM sys_object_domain t1 LEFT JOIN sys_object_domain_license t2 on t2.domainid = t1.domainid WHERE t2.LicSeq is null
AND t1.DisplayName LIKE '%'||#{selectsearch}||'%'

/* queryID : framework.license.selectLicenseAddUserList */
SELECT T1.UserName AS "UserName" , T1.LogonID AS "LogonID" , T1.DeptName AS "DeptName" , T1.IsUse AS "IsUse" , T1.UserCode AS "UserCode" FROM ( SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, A.MultiDisplayName) AS UserName , A.LogonID , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, B.MultiDeptName) AS DeptName , A.IsUse AS IsUse , A.UserCode FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER A INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP B ON B.JobType = 'Origin' AND B.UserCode = A.UserCode AND A.IsUse = 'Y' INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_DOMAIN C ON C.DomainCode = B.CompanyCode LEFT JOIN SYS_LICENSE_OPT_USER D ON D.UserCode = A.UserCode AND D.LicSeq = #{licSeq} WHERE C.DomainID = #{domainId} AND a.IsUse ='Y' AND a.IsDisplay ='Y' AND D.LicSeq is null
AND UPPER(B.MultiDeptName) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchText})||'%'
AND UPPER(A.MultiDisplayName) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{searchText})||'%'
ORDER BY A.SortKey, UserName, DeptName ASC ) T1
mapper.insert: /* queryID : framework.license.insertUserLicense */ INSERT INTO SYS_LICENSE_OPT_USER (LicSeq, DomainID, UserCode, RegisterCode, RegistDate) VALUES (#{licSeq}, #{domainId}, #{userCode}, #{registerCode}, SYSDATE)
